page.title: 18Family Life
page.content: Common surnames in our area include {Stephen,Strachan,Bruce}and{Buchan.}The most common of these is{Buchan}which is not really surprising as the bigger area in which we live is called{Banff and{Buchan. We discovered that the average family in{St.Combs}is just above the national average having{4.8.}We also discovered that the average amount of children in a{St.Combs}family is above the national too having{3.2.}There are few divorces in our area as it is a friendly community. Nearly all the children in our D block attend either {St,Combs Primary School}or{Fraserburgh {Academy,}depending on age.In recent years more and more incomers have come to the area using it as a{commuter {base.}The majority of people in our block are not originally from here.
